subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coach Isiah Thomas will look to a rotating cadre of Knicks to stop the Wizards' Gilbert Arenas, including the high-scoring guard's former teammate, Jared Jeffries.
snippet: Coach Isiah Thomas will look to a rotating cadre of Knicks to stop the Wizards' Gilbert Arenas, including the high-scoring guard's former teammate, Jared Jeffries.
